work: Epistle to the Son of the Wolf
author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: و بعد از شهادت بعضی از شهداء لوح برهان از سماء امر مالک اديان نازل
translation: Following upon the death of some of the martyrs, the Lawh-i-Burhan (Tablet of the Proof) was sent down from the heaven of the Revelation of Him Who is the Lord of Religions:
